title: North Wales Adrenaline Day
tagline: Maximum thrills in a single day
suitableFor: Fit individuals and groups seeking high-adrenaline activities and comfortable with heights and water sports. Must be over 10 years old for some activities.
notSuitableFor: Those with significant mobility issues, fear of heights, or those not comfortable in or around water. Young children under 10.

stops.title: Velocity 2 at Zip World Penrhyn Quarry
stops.description: Experience the fastest zip line in the world, reaching speeds of over 100 mph while taking in stunning views of the quarry and surrounding landscape.

wetAlt.title: Bounce Below at Zip World Llechwedd
wetAlt.description: Explore a series of giant trampolines in a disused slate mine.

budgetAlt.title: Explore Penrhyn Quarry Railway Path
budgetAlt.description: Hike or bike along the scenic path, offering views of the quarry and surrounding mountains, for free.

stops.title: The Heights Cafe & Bistro
stops.description: A cafe bistro at Zip World Penrhyn Quarry serving casual meals with incredible views.

budgetAlt.title: Packed lunch at Llyn Ogwen
budgetAlt.description: Enjoy your own lunch with stunning views of the lake and mountains.

stops.title: Surf Snowdonia Adventure Parc
stops.description: Ride the waves at the UK's only artificial surf lagoon, suitable for all skill levels, with a range of other watersports available.

wetAlt.title: Indoor Climbing at Beacon Climbing Centre
wetAlt.description: A world-class indoor climbing centre offering a variety of climbing routes for all abilities.

budgetAlt.title: Walk along the Conwy Estuary
budgetAlt.description: Enjoy a free and scenic walk along the estuary, taking in views of Conwy Castle and the surrounding countryside.

stops.title: The Groes Inn
stops.description: A historic pub serving excellent food in a cozy atmosphere.

budgetAlt.title: Picnic Dinner by the River Conwy
budgetAlt.description: Bring your own food and enjoy a relaxing dinner by the picturesque River Conwy.

stops.title: Plas Brondanw Gardens and Accommodation
stops.description: A charming B&B with beautiful gardens.

budgetAlt.title: Camping at Bryn Dinas Camping Pods
budgetAlt.description: Affordable camping pods with basic amenities.

knowBeforeYouGo.weather: North Wales weather is unpredictable. Be prepared for rain even in summer. Check the forecast before you go and pack layers.
knowBeforeYouGo.traffic: Traffic can be heavy on the A55, especially during peak season. Allow extra time for travel. Parking at Zip World and Surf Snowdonia can be busy, arrive early.
knowBeforeYouGo.booking: Advance booking is essential for Velocity 2, Surf Snowdonia, and many other adventure activities, especially during school holidays and weekends. Book accommodation well in advance too.
knowBeforeYouGo.fitness: This trip requires a reasonable level of fitness due to the physical nature of the activities. Be prepared for walking, climbing, and potentially swimming.
